summary: The implementation successfully addresses both requirements. REQ-29 is fully implemented with dark mode color palette updates in frontend/index.css using black backgrounds (0% lightness) and red accent colors (hue ~25). REQ-30 is fully implemented with Tailwind CSS configuration updates in frontend/tailwind.config.js that properly integrate with the CSS variables. All acceptance criteria are met with appropriate OKLCH color values for the black and red theme.
